item.description: 오늘 배운 것 Vue로 Todo List작성 App.vue <template> <div id="app"> <div id="nav"> </div> <router-view/> </div> </template> TodoView.vue <template> <div> <TodoList :todos="todos" @checked="updatedTodo"/> <TodoInput @create-todo="createTodo"/> </div> </template> <script> import TodoList from '@/components/TodoList.vue' import TodoInput from '@/components/TodoInput.vue' export default { name: 'TodoView', components: { TodoList, TodoInput, }, data() { return { todos: [ { id: 1, content: 'Django 복습', isCompleted: true, }, { id: 2, content: 'Vue 복습', isCompleted: false, }, { id: 3, content: '저녁', isCompleted: false, }, ] } }, methods: { updatedTodo(todo) { todo.
